name: Shovel Cat
description:
This game was made for two Game Jams:

1. Mini Jame Gam #15 --> requires the theme "Together" and a special Item "Shovel"

2. Mini Jam 127: Cats^2 -->  requires a 6 Color Colorpallete and "Cats^2"

This Game follows all 4 restrictions.

------------------------------------------------------------

In this top-down shooter you play as a small white cat that controls a magical shovel with the ability to shoot. You defeat 20 waves of enemies and a boss, whilst gaining upgrades along the way.

Music by ObsidianAnvil
